title: Von Dehoim
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Bakery, German, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A typical Badisch restaurant, which mostly offers soups and stews, always as a vegan version. A lot  of typical badische dishes, e.g. pfannenkuchen (pan cakes), kartoffelsuppe (potato soup), maultaschen (German ravioli).
